    List of committees of the Majlis and their roles

    Understanding how to use the committee guidance for the Maldives Parliament

    Apr 29, 2021

    Appendix 1

    Standing Committees

    Parliamentary work related committees 

    • General Purpose Committee
    • Committee on Petitions
    • Committee on Member’s Privileges and Ethic

    Government oversight committees

    • Committee on Secondary Legislation.
    • Public Finance Committee  (is this the same as Public Accounts?)
    • Economic Affairs Committee
    • Social Affairs Committee
    • Committee on Security Services (Committee constituted pursuant to Section 241 of the Constitution – does this give it a different status / different powers?).
    • Committee on Independent Institutions
    • Committee on Oversight of the Government
    • Committee on National Development and Heritage
    • Committee on National Security and Foreign Relations
    • Committee on Decentralization
    • Judiciary Committee
    • Environment and Climate Change Committee
    • Human Rights and Gender Committee
    • State-owned Enterprises Committee

    Select (ad hoc) Committees [to be updated regularly]

    • Committee of the Whole House
    • Committee of the Whole House Sub Committee
    • Regulation Review Committee
    • Budget Committee
    • Joint Committee on Economic Affairs & Environment and Climate Change
    • Sub Committee on Organizing Open Day
    • Joint Sub-Committee to review the amendment to the Anti-Human Trafficking Act
    • Sub-Committee to review Maldivian Police Service Bill
    • Joint Committee of Committee on Social Affairs and Committee on Economic Affairs
